quote1: People don't like the true and simple; they like fairy tales and humbug. - Edmond de Goncourt, 1822 - 1896
quote2: The wisest are the most annoyed at the loss of time. - Dante Alighieri, 1265 - 1312
quote3: What you are aware of you are in control of. What you are not aware of is in control of you. - Anthony De Mello
quote4: We shall never have more time. We have, and have always had, all the time there is. - Arnold Bennett
